00303 #ifndef __NO_GENERIC_IOSTREAM
00304     friend std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os,
00305                                        const Population& pop ) {
00306       os << "Population(" << pop.size( ) << ")\n"
00307          << pop.index     << '\n'
00308          << pop.subPop    << '\n'
00309          << pop.ascending << '\n'
00310          << pop.spinOnce  << std::endl;
00311       for( unsigned i = 0; i < pop.size( ); ++i )
00312         os << pop[ i ];
00313       return os;
00314     }
00315 
00316     friend std::istream& operator >> ( std::istream& is,
00317                                        Population& pop ) {
00318       unsigned i, popSize( 0 );
00319       std::string s, t;
00320       
00321       is >> s;
00322       is.get( );   // skip end of line
00323 
00324       if( (!pop.subPop || pop.size() == 0) && is.good( ) &&
00325           s.substr( 0, 11 ) == "Population(" &&
00326           s.find( ')' ) != std::string::npos ) {
00327 
00328         // Extract the size indication from the string:
00329         t = s.substr( s.find( '(' )+1, s.find( ')' ) - s.find( '(' ) - 1 );
00330         popSize = atoi( t.c_str( ) );
00331 
00332         // Adapt size of Individual:
00333         pop.resize( popSize );
00334         
00335         is >> pop.index
00336            >> pop.subPop
00337            >> pop.ascending
00338            >> pop.spinOnce;
00339         
00340         for( i = 0; i < pop.size( ); ++i )
00341           is >> pop[ i ];
00342       }
00343 
00344       return is;
00345     }
00346 #endif // !__NO_GENERIC_IOSTREAM
